pageContext.claim: “Nancy Pelosi was all set. She loved doing it [impeachment]. She -- from day one, but she thought it was what Schiff said. When she saw the conversation, she said to a people, ‘What the hell did you get me into?’ So they could have dropped it, but they said, ‘Let's give it a shot.’”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be inventing this tale. There is no evidence Pelosi said in private conversation what Trump claims she said after the transcript came out; her staff adamantly denies it. Pelosi issued a scathing statement after release of the rough transcript, which was accurately portrayed in the whistleblower complaint. “The release of the notes of the call by the White House confirms that the President engaged in behavior that undermines the integrity of our elections, the dignity of the office he holds and our national security," Pelosi said. "The President has tried to make lawlessness a virtue in America and now is exporting it abroad.”
